title: PPC Specialist (Google, Meta) – Shopify E-commerce
job_overview:
We are seeking a results-driven digital ads manager with proven experience running Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram), and other paid media campaigns for Shopify stores. You will be responsible for planning, launching, optimising, and scaling our paid advertising efforts with the goal of increasing ROAS and driving profitable growth.

If you also have experience in Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), that’s a strong bonus.
